pageContext.claim: “If you're from the United States, you do make that decision to make a right turn where you're supposed to make a left turn. The roads are opposite. And she said that's what happened. That happens to a lot of people, by the way.”
pageContext.analysis: Automobile drivers in the United Kingdom drive on the left side of the road, with steering wheels in the right side of the vehicle. It does not affect how cars turn.
